attributes.title: Lags, Glitches, Then Crashes.
attributes.review: this app is SO poorly made. it crashes my iphone 11 every SINGLE TIME i open it. even when the app isn’t open, my phone will lag, glitch, and shut down any app i try to open afterwards. the app itself has intelligible information that can’t even be understood. I don’t know who’s idea it was to make this god awful app. seriously. it’s like a 2 year old made it. 1 star.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: I came to this app to look for reasons to love our president but this made me hate our president even more. My dog was a HUGE trump supporter. He got painted 🍊 and everything. He had T-shirts, posters, hats, and stickers. But he was one the app and it crashed and the entire phone exploded in which it was right next to him. It ended in killing him. This app proved to me that Trump doesn’t only kill anyone who dislikes him. He kills people who love him too. RIP my dog.

attributes.title: ✨🥰😍 Donald Trump on a gravestone 2020
attributes.userName: eat tidepods if u support DT ✨
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! As soon as i opened it up, it played awful america chanting music, asking for my personal information which i had to decline. it even had donald trumps leaked nude on the home page! our so called “president” is a racist, homophobic, narcissistic, selfish,and an immature “man” (though there are many other words that describe him). we need to get him out of office asap. if you support trump you’re a white suprematist 🖕🏻

attributes.title: HORRIBLE app
attributes.review: This is such a glitchy, hard to use, and over all horrible to use app. It’s not user friendly, doesn’t work half the time, and is constantly crashing. Not to mention that all of my family members have gotten their phones hacked through this app. Terrible programming, awful application, caused a death in my family, summoned demons in my room, made me question my mortality, and gave my explosive farts. DONT DOWNLOAD ITS CURSED

attributes.title: horrible app!!
attributes.review: this app was the worst thing ever! it took up all my storage just for it to lag. i had to restart my phone it was so bad. i hate everything about this app and wouldn’t wish anyone i hate to download it it’s so bad. i wish i could get back those 4 hours of my time where i downloaded it and it almost broke my phone. please DO NOT waste your time getting this app it only causes harm

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: I voted for Trump in the last election, but found that was a huge mistake! This app showcases all of the awful things that our President has done to our country. Also, the app took way too long to download, killed my battery within 5 minutes of getting on it, and is poorly put together. You will get zero benefit from this app, other than learning who not to vote for next election, Trump.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This is possibly the worst app I have ever downloaded and I’ve downloaded fnaf knock off games. I downloaded it to try to find ANYTHING to like about this man and I couldn’t find a single thing. I’m pretty sure he is t even human. I feel it is possible that someone doing scientific research on a cheese puff accidentally enlarged it and gave it human properties but without the ability to think or communicate properly. 1 star

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I used this app for maybe 10 minutes and COULD NOT figure it out 😭 the layout was AWFUL and truly disgusted me how horrible it was. Then my nephew showed me how to use and it I somehow ended up on a gun page in front of my 10 year old nephew which was AWFUL that boy didn’t need to be exposed to that yet. Finally I ended in the deep web trying to leave the gun website which I got to from this app. 0/10 WILL NEVER USE AGAIN

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is just SO bad.... ive had it for 10 seconds now and i instantly regret getting it.. its just the worst. Thanks to this app, my phone now suffers PTSD 😡 you guys are harming many devices with this app and it NEEDS to go. Also it like smells so bad in this app too my phone almost lost its sense of smell. My phone and i have NEVER been so traumatized in out entire life.... this app needs to be gone..... now... 😡😡🤬🤬😠😠😤😤😤👿👿👿🙄🙄🙄😾😾😾🙎‍♀️🙎‍♀️🙎‍♀️🙎‍♀️👎👎👎🖕🖕🖕
